data.representation.util

Class DataSortableInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.representation.util.DataSortableInfo

  • public class DataSortableInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class enables sorting the DataInstance objects by some external meta-criterion. Of course, this could be done separately while keeping track of the resulting index permutation and often is. However, this class gives an additional option by embedding the instances into sortable objects.
